channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13841] Orc split generation returns different strategies with cache enabled vs disabled
item.description: Split strategy chosen by OrcInputFormat should not change when enabling or disabling footer cache. Currently if footer cache is disabled minSplits in OrcInputFormat.Context will be set to -1 which is used during determination of split strategies. minSplits should be set to requested value or some default instead of cache size
item.summary: Orc split generation returns different strategies with cache enabled vs disabled

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: sershe Can you please take a look?
